slack.receive_message.name: Receive Slack Message
slack.receive_message.doc: Trigger workflow when a message is received in Slack (persistent listener by default)

keyword.name: Keyword
keyword.doc: Keyword to trigger on (optional, triggers on all messages if not specified)

timeout.name: Timeout (seconds)
timeout.doc: How long to wait for a message (-1 for persistent listening, default: -1)
